thread.title: Schnucks to open in Ferguson Shop 'n Save building
thread.title_full: Schnucks to open in Ferguson Shop 'n Save building

author: Lisa Brown St. Louis Post-Dispatch
title: Schnucks to open in Ferguson Shop 'n Save building
text:
What's going up: Read the Building Blocks blog 
“Relocating to the Ferguson location will allow us to bring our unique combination of quality, service, selection and value to more customers in the area,” Schnuck Markets Chairman and CEO Todd Schnuck said in a statement. “We welcome the present Shop ’n Save customers and believe our Cool Valley customers will follow us one mile north on Florissant Road.” 
Maryland Heights-based Schnuck Markets has eight stores in north St. Louis County, employing more than 900 people. Its store at Grandview Plaza in Florissant is less than three miles from the Ferguson location. Companywide, Schnucks has 100 stores in five states. 
Kirkwood-based Shop ’n Save has 43 stores in Missouri and Illinois, according to the company’s website. Most are in metro St. Louis. Business Briefing from St. Louis Post-Dispatch
